implements TransactionStorage

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addTransaction(SignedTransaction transaction)
      Add a new transaction to the store. If the store already has a transaction with the same id it will be overwritten.
      SignedTransaction getTransaction(SecureHash id)
      Return the transaction with the given id, or null if no such transaction exists.
      java.lang.Iterable<net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction> getTransactions() 
      rx.Observable<net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction> getUpdates()
      Get a synchronous Observable of updates. When observations are pushed to the Observer, the vault will already incorporate the update.
      rx.subjects.SerializedSubject<net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction,net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction> getUpdatesPublisher() 
      kotlin.Pair<java.util.List,rx.Observable> track()
      Returns all currently stored transactions and further fresh ones.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBTransactionStorage

        public DBTransactionStorage()

    • Method Detail

      • addTransaction

        public boolean addTransaction(SignedTransaction transaction)

        Add a new transaction to the store. If the store already has a transaction with the same id it will be overwritten.

        Parameters:
        transaction - The transaction to be recorded.
        Returns:
        true if the transaction was recorded successfully, false if it was already recorded.

      • getTransaction

        public SignedTransaction getTransaction(SecureHash id)

        Return the transaction with the given id, or null if no such transaction exists.

      • getUpdatesPublisher

        public rx.subjects.SerializedSubject<net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction,net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction> getUpdatesPublisher()

      • getUpdates

        public rx.Observable<net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction> getUpdates()

        Get a synchronous Observable of updates. When observations are pushed to the Observer, the vault will already incorporate the update.

      • track

        public kotlin.Pair<java.util.List,rx.Observable> track()

        Returns all currently stored transactions and further fresh ones.

      • getTransactions

        public java.lang.Iterable<net.corda.core.transactions.SignedTransaction> getTransactions()
